sent.orig: I'm scared. I'm scared, very scared.
sent.trans: 我害怕，我害怕，我非常害怕。

sent.orig: The girl is scared, very scared.
Xiangzi regretted nothing, he was only scared, scared of that ghost which followed him constantly, everywhere.
sent.trans: 他并不后悔，只是怕，怕那个无处无时不紧跟着他的鬼。

sent.orig: Everyone's scared sometimes, even grown ups. It's not being a baby to be scared.
sent.trans: 每个人都有害怕的时候，就算是大人也有。不是只有孩子才会害怕。

sent.orig: Why won't you come on the trip? Are you scared? What are you scared of?
sent.trans: 你怎么不参加旅行？你害怕吗？你怕什么呢？［bescaredof（害怕）相当于beafraidof］。
